lead_paragraph: He acted within weeks of the Securities and Exchange Commission’s order that cleared his path to affiliate with Guggenheim Securities.

headline.print_headline: Rattner Drops Bid to Return to Investment Banking
headline.main: Rattner Drops Bid to Return to Investment Banking

snippet: He acted within weeks of the Securities and Exchange Commission’s order that cleared his path to affiliate with Guggenheim Securities.
abstract: Former financier Steven L Rattner drops bid for reinstatement in investment banking; Securities and Exchange Commission recently cleared way for him to affiliate with Guggenheim Securities.
